mapper.select: select id as id, log_id as logId, order_id as orderId, order_status as orderStatus, operation_content as operationContent, create_time as createTime, create_by_id as createById, create_by_name as createByName from order_store_operation_log where 1 = 1 and order_id = #{orderId} order by create_time desc
mapper.insert: insert into order_store_operation_log (log_id, order_id, order_status, operation_content, create_time, create_by_id, create_by_name) values (#{logId}, #{orderId}, #{orderStatus}, #{operationContent}, #{createTime}, #{createById}, #{createByName})
